name: Focus Group Guidelines
description: Instructions on how to set up a research activity based on focus groups, for a co-production project.
problem_profiles: Data collection about users and their behavior
overview_text: This INTERLINKER is composed by a document that can be visualized and/or downloaded to enlarge stakeholders' know-how on methods for problem and context analysis. It contains a part that can be customized to prepare a reserch plan for focus groups.
